Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapMarker

  • Packages that use MapMarker 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.cluster
    This package provides classes, interfaces, and enumerations for Marker clustering.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping
    The mapping package provides classes, interfaces, and enumerations that display an interactive map, and related functionality that allows your application to create and add map content.

    • Uses of MapMarker in com.here.android.mpa.cluster

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.cluster that return types with arguments of type MapMarker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<MapMarker> ClusterLayer.getMarkers()
      Retrieves all MapMarker instances added to this layer.
      java.util.Collection<MapMarker> ClusterViewObject.getMarkers()
      Returns all the markers represented by this cluster.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.cluster with parameters of type MapMarker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ClusterLayer.addMarker(MapMarker marker)
      Adds a MapMarker to this layer.
      boolean ClusterLayer.removeMarker(MapMarker marker)
      Removes the given MapMarker from this layer.
      Method parameters in com.here.android.mpa.cluster with type arguments of type MapMarker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ClusterLayer.addMarkers(java.util.Collection<MapMarker> markers)
      Adds a collection of MapMarker to this layer.
      boolean ClusterLayer.removeMarkers(java.util.Collection<MapMarker> markers)
      Removes a collection of MapMarker from this layer.

      This method enables or disables decluttering in tilted view.

      Sets the description text.
      MapMarker MapMarker.setDraggable(boolean isDraggable)
      Sets whether this marker is draggable or not.
      MapMarker MapMarker.setDraggingOffsetEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether this marker has offset from the tap coordinate during dragging to avoid overlapping marker image by user's finger.
      MapMarker MapMarker.setIcon(Image icon)
      Sets an icon image for this MapMarker.

      Sets a title to be used by the default info bubble.
